title: Ping issue with Telstra?
body:
So I hadn't played league in 3 weeks, came back and my ping in game is screwed..

Every second it changes, it's constantly fluctuating from ~100-150, sometimes it randomly goes up to 300. Thing is my internet is the same, speed is still the same. I'm looking in the resource monitor on my pc and nothing is chewing the bandwith..

This has to be on Telstra's end right? They've become pretty bad lately between internet and phone service tbh.

Can anyone with Telstra for their isp confirm the same?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Telstra customer here, no issues to be reported on my end.

Could you do the following for me.

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text and reply back with them here (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this)
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and post back with a link to your results here.
